episodes.title: BREAKING: Bishop David Oyedepo’s..Dayo Olutayo Divorces His Wife After 33 Years
episodes.description:
Bishop David Oyedepo's brother-in-law to — Brother Bishop  Dayo Olutayo  has reportedly ended his 33-year marriage and introduced a new wife to his congregation.

Bishop Dayo Olutayo, founder and senior pastor of Good Tidings Bible Church International, is no ordinary preacher. Rising through the ranks of Winners’ Chapel under Bishop David Oyedepo, his ministry journey includes remarkable missionary success in Kenya, the founding of GTBCI in Abuja, and the expansion of his influence across Nigeria and even into Canada.

For over three decades, Bishop Dayo and Pastor Bolu Olutayo were widely regarded as a powerful ministry couple — building a family, raising three sons, and establishing major outreach programs including the Dayo & Bolu Olutayo Foundation, which focused on destiny discovery and social empowerment.

But in December 2025, everything changed.

A viral video from a church service shows Bishop Olutayo formally introducing Funmilola Akinrinde as his new wife, while making controversial declarations about his past marriage that ignited massive public debate. The announcement has since dominated social media, triggering intense reactions, unanswered questions, and emotional responses from followers, critics, and observers around the world.

This documentary digs deep into:
• Bishop Dayo Olutayo’s rise in ministry
• His family legacy and 33-year marriage
• The viral church announcement
• Public reactions and controversies
• What this means for faith, leadership, and trust

Whether you’re watching for information, clarity, or perspective — this is not a small story.
